MLB 17 UI Concept Design · Kyle Jackson Design
MLB 17 User Interface Design

Using Adobe After Effects, Adobe Photoshop, and Adobe Illustrator, I designed a User Interface for a game concept, MLB 17. The process that is shown I one that takes the using from the start screen of the game all the way to the store screen where the user buys, and opens a card pack.
